channel.title: Master monk server
channel.description:
well, this is the client for my server.
Note: Go into client.java then search for "setserver" Then change it to your IP.
This isnt really anything special. I Just wanted to release it :\
Pictures :\
(http://i471.photobucket.com/albums/rr71/Master_Monk_2009/pvpitemsanddeathcape.jpg)
(http://i471.photobucket.com/albums/rr71/Master_Monk_2009/Monk-Scape-2.jpg)
(http://i471.photobucket.com/albums/rr71/Master_Monk_2009/Gwd.jpg)
(http://i471.photobucket.com/albums/rr71/Master_Monk_2009/Fightpits.jpg)
(http://i471.photobucket.com/albums/rr71/Master_Monk_2009/Jad1.jpg)
(http://i471.photobucket.com/albums/rr71/Master_Monk_2009/bandoswhip.jpg)
Download link - http://failai.in/F161CC787A/master_monk.zip
All the credits for the custom items go to, SilentCJ Mr Linksys And Galkon.
